mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NO, cooperative_name, biz_detail, s_agree, ch_money, su_date, area, upjong, c_type, zip_num, cooperative_addr, ceo_name, p_number, c_number, e_mail, homepage, req_date, CONTENTS FROM CooperBoard WHERE cooperative_name like '%${cooperative_name}%' ORDER BY req_date DESC

SELECT SEQ_NO, cooperative_name, biz_detail, s_agree, ch_money, su_date, area, upjong, c_type, zip_num, cooperative_addr, ceo_name, p_number, c_number, e_mail, homepage, req_date, DEL_GB, CONTENTS FROM CooperBoard WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY req_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CooperBoard ( cooperative_name, biz_detail, s_agree, ch_money, su_date, area, upjong, c_type, zip_num, cooperative_addr, ceo_name, p_number, c_number, e_mail, homepage, req_date, CONTENTS ) VALUES ("${cooperative_name}", "${biz_detail}", "${s_agree}", "${ch_money}", "${su_date}", "${area}", "${upjong}", "${c_type}", "${zipNo}", "${roadFullAddr}", "${ceo_name}", "${p_number}", "${c_number}", "${e_mail}", "${homepage}", NOW(), "${contents}")
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NO, cooperative_name, biz_detail, s_agree, ch_money, su_date, area, upjong, c_type, zip_num, cooperative_addr, ceo_name, p_number, c_number, e_mail, homepage, req_date, DEL_GB, CONTENTS FROM CooperBoard WHERE SEQ_NO = #{SEQ_NO} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE CooperBoard SET cooperative_name = "${cooperative_name}", biz_detail = "${biz_detail}", s_agree = "${s_agree}", ch_money = "${ch_money}", su_date = "${su_date}", area = "${area}", upjong = "${upjong}", c_type = "${c_type}", zip_num = "${zipNo}", cooperative_addr = "${roadFullAddr}", ceo_name = "${ceo_name}", p_number = "${p_number}", c_number = "${c_number}", e_mail = "${e_mail}", homepage = "${homepage}", req_date = NOW(), CONTENTS = "${contents}" WHERE SEQ_NO = "${SEQ_NO}"
UPDATE CooperBoard SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE SEQ_NO = #{SEQ_NO}
